shortdesc.p: Documentation for the IOP Publishing specific implementation of BITS 2.0 for book content

shortdesc.p: The root element for a book is a <book> element.

topicmeta.shortdesc: The root element for a book is a book element.

shortdesc.p: <book-meta >is a mandatory element for all books as a container for the book level metadata.

topicmeta.shortdesc: book-meta is a mandatory element for all books as a container for the book level metadata.

shortdesc.p: All books must contain a <book-id> element containing the book level DOI

topicmeta.shortdesc: All books must contain a book-id element containing the book level DOI

shortdesc.p: Capture the book title in a <book-title> element inside a <book-title-group> element.
